projects.title: Adaptive Intelligent Apps for Manufacturing (AIAMFG)
projects.details: Machine learning solution tailored for analyzing manufacturing domain business data, extracting valuable insights aimed at optimizing manufacturing process.
points: Identified Patterns and Trends: Utilized Python machine learning algorithms (scikit-learn, pandas) to predict the quality of final manufactured products based on raw material quality and manufacturing processes. This analysis enabled manufacturing clients to make data-driven decisions, reducing faulty products by nearly 20% for one major customer.

Machine Learning Implementation: Led the development of a model-building module and implemented machine learning algorithms (decision tree, random forest, SVM) using Oracle Machine Learning for R(ORE).

Automation and Efficiency: Developed Selenium automation for web application testing, reducing over 40 employee hours per 3-4 month release cycle, accelerating product delivery, and achieving cost efficiencies.

projects.title: Oracle Validation Test Suite (VTS)
projects.details: VTS stress tests system components such as processor, memory, and IO.
points: Developed diagnostic tests using C and assembly language to simulate manufacturing and functional faults in processors and memory systems.

projects.title: Defend
projects.details: Network-based application that provides spam blocker, Identity filter, and Robocalls tracker/blocker features.
points: Led Team Management and Development: Directed and mentored a team of four developers in an Agile environment using Scrum and Kanban, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality software solutions aligned with organizational goals.

Developed Full-Stack Applications: Built end-to-end applications integrating frontend technologies (React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and backend solutions (SQL, Oracle Database, Java Spring Boot, PL/SQL), showcasing strong problem-solving abilities. Used Docker-compose to containerise multiple components of the application.
API Development and Proof of Concept: Designed and maintained REST APIs using Java Spring Boot and conducted POC demonstrations for stakeholders and clients.

Enhanced Software Delivery and Quality: Managed requirements, maintained documentation, performed code reviews, and implemented CI/CD pipelines with GIT for efficient version control and high-quality releases.

projects.title: ATF (Advanced Toll-Free)
projects.details: Core network service that lets callers make free phone calls to service subscribers by dialling special service numbers, such as 8xx numbers in USA.
points: Managed and mentored team of four developers on agile best practices, ensuring task scheduling and performance expectations were met.
Orchestrated task schedules for team members and established clear performance expectations.
Facilitated daily stand-up meetings for teams of four, focusing on priorities, requirements, and project progress.
Captured customer requirements and authored comprehensive product documentation.
Conducted thorough code reviews and performance assessments for team members to ensure high-quality deliverables.

education.position: Post Degree Diploma in Predictive Analytics
description: Designed and implemented Python-based ETL pipeline in Jupyter Notebook to integrate diverse data formats into MongoDB and Postgres databases, and execute transformations.
Generated statistical reports and visualizations for datasets, including Malware detection in IoT devices and Credit card fraud prediction.
Employed shell scripting to orchestrate ETL processes, handling ingestion, extraction, and data transformations from remote sources.

education.position: Master of Science (by Research) in Computer Science and Technology
description:
Publications:
  • Suriender Singh and S. Selvakumar, “Detection of Distributed Denial of Service Attacks Using Panel of Experts”, Bilingual International Conference on Information Technology: Yesterday, Today, and Tomorrow, 19 - 21, Feb.’15, DRDO, Delhi, pp. 248 - 254, DESIDOC.

  • Suriender Singh and S. Selvakumar, “A hybrid feature subset selection by combining filters and genetic algorithm”, In Proceedings of International Conference on Computing, Communication & Automation (ICCCA), Greater Noida, India, 15-16 May 2015, pp. 283-289.

education.position: Bachelor of Technology (B. Tech) in Information Technology
